value:
$WmMPID_ピエリ,ch05_22_Pieri_F_Normal,Face|$w0|I'm gonna bring your guts back to
Lord Xander! Teeheehee!$k$p

$WmMPID_エリーゼ,ch05_25_Elise_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Hi, hi! Want to buy a flower? I'll make
you a special deal, heehee!$k$p

$WmMPID_レオン,ch05_24_Leon_M_Normal,Face|$w0|I hope you like the dark. I'm about to
drown you in it...$k$p

$WmMPID_カミラ,ch05_28_Camilla_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Hmm... Once all of you are out of my
way, the summoner will be all mine!$k$p

$WmMPID_ラズワルド,ch05_04_Lazward_M_Normal,Face|$w0|My duty is to protect Lord Xander
and the kingdom of Nohr, in that
order.$k$p

$WmMPID_マークス,ch05_21_Marks_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Time to settle this once and for all.
Don't hesitate... This isn't a mock
battle.$k$p
